pageProps.title: spacy-graphql
pageProps.teaser: Query spaCy's linguistic annotations using GraphQL

data.title: spacy-graphql
data.slogan: Query spaCy's linguistic annotations using GraphQL
data.description: A very simple and experimental app that lets you query spaCy's linguistic annotations using [GraphQL](https://graphql.org/). The API currently supports most token attributes, named entities, sentences and text categories (if available as `doc.cats`, i.e. if you added a text classifier to a model). The `meta` field will return the model meta data. Models are only loaded once and kept in memory.
code_example: nlp(text: "Zuckerberg is the CEO of Facebook.", model: "en_core_web_sm") {
data.author: Ines Montani
